entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn LSIF generator should support optional sharding mode #70438
  • Constant folding doesn't work correctly sometimes #70437
  • Search for instances of Primary Constructor usage #70436
  • BC40003 code fix should offer both 'Overloads' and 'Shadows' #70434
  • Unable to run tests #70431
  • New feature: disable autofix for specific rules in .editorConfig #70428

Closed

  • `u8` should be colorized just like a string #70439
  • Diagnostic tags don't follow LSP spec #70426
  • EnC: Custom attribute deltas are emitted incorrectly #70357
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34218.35 #70430
  • Feature Semantic Classification is not available #70429

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent StringBuilder resizes during SyntaxNode.GetText #70447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure the VSCode server process runs on non-preview runtime #70446
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix TriggerOnTyping to not block explicit invoking completion #70444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config file after 17.9 branch is created #70442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Clear rca2 #70433
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle missing ISimplificationService implementation for non-C#/VB languages #70425
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged
  • Revert "Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process"" #70424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add logging to LSP completion handler #70422
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Refactor how Extract Method returns results. #70443
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Slight improvement to refactoring preview performance for InlineTemporaryCodeRefactoringProvider #70440
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix classification layering #70416
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Minor cleanup in extract-method code. #70432
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update breaking change docs #70435
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix emitting Custom Attribute deltas #70350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #70408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next

Updated

  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a simple diagnostic identifier to dedupe diagnostics #70410
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clear 'run code analysis' results when a build completes #70412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #70417
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure
